alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Snowy Range Foothills; Southwest Carbon County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 08 at 1:16PM MST until November 09 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Ferris/Seminoe/Shirley Mountains, Central Carbon County, North Snowy Range Foothills and Southwest Carbon County. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 2 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Light weight and high profile vehicles including light load semis and those towing camper trailers will be at risk.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 MPH or gusts of 58 MPH or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Snowy Range Foothills; Southwest Carbon County
